snippet.title: THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON - They Coming - Teaser
snippet.description:
THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON – They Coming - Teaser

THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON is coming to Steam on January 20, 2025!

THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON is a TPS with a unique blend of action/adventure gameplay with survival/RPG mechanics in a science-fiction universe. Jensen, the sole survivor of the Nexentia shuttle crash, finds himself alone on the planet CECLON, in an arid, hostile desert! You'll have to survive and face the terrible Nocturnes, primitive creatures, in order to bring Veka energy back to Earth, humanity's only hope.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1467090/THEDARKSIDEOFCECLON/

Follow THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON on:
- Discord: https://discord.gg/Kqa47ppNqh
- Website: https://solidsstudiosolo.wixsite.com/thedarksideofceclon

Follow SOLIDS Studio on: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SOLIDSStudio/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/solidsstudio_game/?hl=fr
- Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/SolidsStudio
- Linkedin: https://fr.linkedin.com/company/solidsstudio-solo

Copyright SOLIDS Studio 2024

#THEDARKSIDEOFCECLON #TDSOC #teaser #indiegame #indiegames #videogames #gamer #games #gaming #tps #action #adventure #survival #rpg #explore #scifi #space #openworld #CECLON #steam #pc #developer #youtubegaming

-------

Song: CopyClear - The Arrival (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
Music provided by CopyClear
Video Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IYv4UQuUdTM
